algorithm: The new algorithm assigns scores to the bins based on the ratio of the remaining capacity to the item size factor. It computes the remaining capacity divided by the item size, subtracts it from the maximum capacity, and normalizes the scores based on the maximum score.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    remaining_capacity = max_capacity - bins

    scores = (remaining_capacity / item) / max_capacity
    scores /= np.max(scores)

    return scores
